title: Davos Economic Forum Is Postponed as Omicron Forces More Cancellations, Travel Bans
sub_head: Israel set to bar citizens from traveling to the U.S. and Canada
body:
Israel is set to bar its citizens from traveling to the U.S. and Canada because of the spread of the Omicron variant—as the World Economic Forum said it would postpone next month’s annual meeting in the Swiss mountain resort of Davos for the second successive year.
The forum’s organizers said it would delay the in-person meeting planned for Jan. 17-21 until the early summer and hold online sessions for participants next month.
